top_comments.comment: *Yes, this is entertaining to watch, very fun! But, I don’t think the hamsters would like it very much, the set ups do look safe, but to the hamsters it’s tricky and could cause pain to them. Make sure to not put hamsters in the same area with them, they are big time loners and do not like to be with each other much. PS I like your content, but make sure the hamsters are getting good care to!*
I felt bad for the hamster falling off 3:22
